name: 2 Fast Driver
storyline: There is everything you’ve ever dreamt of: pimped-out cars, vrooms, breathtaking pursuits, crazy rivals, and unexpected obstacles. Various locations, big city lights, and noise from cars await you! Isn't it thrilling and blood-boiling? Drive at a crazy speed and overtake your hard-boiled rivals. This race is not for the faint-hearted! Put the pedal to the metal and finish first!
summary:
Buckle up and feel a rush of adrenaline in 2 Fast Driver, a breakneck racing game.
A 2004 sequel to a European cult classic racing game.
